name: pcall.js
description: Lua pcall inspired - calls the function f with the given arguments in protected mode
author: metaory <metaory@gmail.com>

scripts.publish: npm version prerelease && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.watch:build: watchexec -w src -- 'npm run dev:build && npm run dev'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:build & npm run watch:dev
